messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Central Command has renamed the station to "Ligger encampment 14".

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Central Command has renamed the station to "Orbital Object Romeo".

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Central Command has renamed the station to "ligger concentration camp 55".

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we just realized that putting a station full of liggers and having the AI on atsmiov was a bad idea

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.body: Find out who the tator tot isss, kill them and bring them to bridge to get your free all accesss item. Alssso be weary of any cultissstsss or lingsss.
